item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Show HN: Put this touch sensor on a robot and learn super precise tasks (215 points | 37 comments)

10. Show HN: Open-source text classification CLI – train models with no labeled data (36 points | discuss)
11. MemoRAG – Enhance RAG with memory-based knowledge discovery for long contexts (113 points | 24 comments)
12. Open source maintainers underpaid, swamped by security, and going gray (85 points | 47 comments)
13. UpCodes (YC S17) Is Hiring a Marketing Leader ( | hide)

25. Federal civil rights watchdog sounds alarm over Feds use of facial recognition (91 points | 63 comments)
26. Dropbox keeps threatening to delete my files (68 points | 32 comments)
27. Glass Antenna Turns windows into 5G Base Stations (362 points | 131 comments)

29. 3D Reconstruction with Spatial Memory (92 points | 13 comments)
